update.description:
New libogre-2.1\* debs have been uploaded onto [packages.osrfoundation.org](http://packages.osrfoundation.org/gazebo/ubuntu-prerelease/dists/bionic/main/binary-amd64/Packages) \(pre-release repo, bionic only\). They can now be installed side-by-side with ogre1.x. The main changes in this PR are:

* Updated pkg-config logic to look for OGRE-2.1 \(new debs install .pc file with version suffix\)
* Added IgnOGRE::IgnOgre and IgnOGRE2::IgnOGRE2 targets
* Renamed FindOGRE2.cmake to FindIgnOGRE2.cmake to be consistent with FindIgnOGRE.cmake
update.title: Update FindOgre2 to work with new debs

content.raw: I remember there was a reason I changed it to `pkg_check_modules`. I think it was because the ign version was setting variables / targets that were not needed. The idea of this loop is to find the correct ogre path before setting the variables/targets so we don’t want to do it every iteration.
content.html: I remember there was a reason I changed it to pkg_check_modules. I think it was because the ign version was setting variables / targets that were not needed. The idea of this loop is to find the correct ogre path before setting the variables/targets so we don’t want to do it every iteration.

content.raw: excuse me, it was using the `_quiet` version: `ign_pkg_check_modules_quiet`
content.html: excuse me, it was using the _quiet version: ign_pkg_check_modules_quiet
